abstract: Paul Leka, songwriter and producer best known for writing the chorus of Na Na Hey Hey (Kiss Him Goodbye), hit that was reborn as a sports arena anthem, dies at age 68.
snippet: Mr. Leka was a songwriter and producer who was best known for helping to write “Na Na Hey Hey (Kiss Him Goodbye),” which has become a sports arena anthem.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Leka was a songwriter and producer who was best known for helping to write “Na Na Hey Hey (Kiss Him Goodbye),” which has become a sports arena anthem.

headline.main: Paul Leka, a Songwriter of ‘Na Na Hey Hey,’ Dies at 68
headline.print_headline: Paul Leka, 68; Wrote Hit That Became Arena Taunt
headline.seo: Paul Leka, a Songwriter of ‘Na Na Hey Hey,’ Dies at 68
